response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for you based on your needs and interests. After careful consideration, I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that align with your requirements. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1200000}
